job.title: Software Engineer
job.description: # Duties and Responsibilities<br><br>```<br>Design, Develop and own scalable Cloud Data Pipeline.<br>Design and Develop scalable micro services.<br>Write great quality, maintainable code following best practices.<br>Apply analytical skills to solving complex financial problems.<br>Develop ETL pipeline to extract data from multiple cloud sources.<br>Develop efficient data model for storing time-series data.<br>```<br><br># Skill Requirements<br><br>```<br>Experience with programming languages like Python and Java.<br>Experience with Elasticsearch, Apache Solr, Apache Druid etc.<br>Experience with NoSQL databases like Cassandra, DynamoDB.<br>Experience working with SQL and SQL databases like MySQL, Postgres etc.<br>Experience with Stream Data Processing tools like Kafka, Airflow, Apache Spark.<br>Strong analytic skills.<br>Development experience with Unix tools and scripts.<br>```
